subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Game 1 of the National League Championship Series between the Mets and St. Louis was postponed because of rain, setting up five consecutive games and complicating the Mets’ already shaky pitching situation.
snippet: Game 1 of the National League Championship Series between the Mets and St. Louis was postponed because of rain, setting up five consecutive games and complicating the Mets’ already shaky pitching situation.
